trans-unit.source: Specifying 1 generation with +RTS -G1 gives you a simple 2-space collector, as you would expect. In a 2-space collector, the -A ⟨size⟩ option specifies the minimum allocation area size, since the allocation area will grow with the amount of live data in the heap. In a multi-generational collector the allocation area is a fixed size (unless you use the -H [⟨size⟩] option).
trans-unit.target: 如预期的那样，用 +RTS -G1 指定1代可以为您提供一个简单的2空间收集器。在2空间收集器中， -A ⟨size⟩ 选项指定最小的分配区域大小，因为分配区域将随堆中活动数据的数量而增长。在多代收集器中，分配区域是固定大小的（除非使用 -H [⟨size⟩] 选项）。

trans-unit.source: Stable branches are numbered x.y, where ⟨y⟩ is even. Releases on the stable branch x.y are numbered x.y.z, where ⟨z⟩ (>= 1) is the patchlevel number. Patchlevels are bug-fix releases only, and never change the programmer interface to any system-supplied code. However, if you install a new patchlevel over an old one you will need to recompile any code that was compiled against the old libraries.
trans-unit.target: 稳定的分支编号为 x.y ，其中⟨y⟩为偶数。稳定分支 x.y 上的发行版编号为 x.y.z ，其中⟨z⟩（> = 1）是补丁程序级别编号。补丁程序级别仅是错误修复版本，切勿将程序员界面更改为任何系统提供的代码。但是，如果在旧版本上安装了新的补丁程序级别，则将需要重新编译针对旧库编译的所有代码。

trans-unit.source: Stable names are a way of performing fast (O(1)), not-quite-exact comparison between objects.
trans-unit.target: 稳定名是一种在对象之间进行快速(O(1))、不完全精确比较的方式。

trans-unit.source: Stable names have the following property:
trans-unit.target: 稳定的名称具有以下属性:

trans-unit.source: Stable names solve the following problem: suppose you want to build a hash table with Haskell objects as keys, but you want to use pointer equality for comparison; maybe because the keys are large and hashing would be slow, or perhaps because the keys are infinite in size. We can't build a hash table using the address of the object as the key, because objects get moved around by the garbage collector, meaning a re-hash would be necessary after every garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 稳定名可以解决以下问题:假设你想用Haskell对象作为键建立一个哈希表,但你想使用指针平等来进行比较;也许是因为键很大,哈希会很慢,也许是因为键的大小是无限的。我们不能用对象的地址作为键来建立哈希表,因为对象会被垃圾收集器移动,这意味着每次垃圾收集后都需要重新哈希。

trans-unit.source: Standard Haskell has a rich type language. Types classify terms and serve to avoid many common programming mistakes. The kind language, however, is relatively simple, distinguishing only regular types (kind Type) and type constructors (e.g. kind Type -> Type -> Type). In particular when using advanced type system features, such as type families (Type families) or GADTs (Generalised Algebraic Data Types (GADTs)), this simple kind system is insufficient, and fails to prevent simple errors. Consider the example of type-level natural numbers, and length-indexed vectors:
trans-unit.target: 标准Haskell具有丰富的类型语言。类型对术语进行分类，并避免了许多常见的编程错误。但是，种类语言相对简单，仅区分常规类型（kind Type ）和类型构造函数（例如，种类 Type -> Type -> Type ）。特别是在使用高级类型系统功能（例如类型族（Type family）或GADTs（广义代数数据类型（GADTs）））时，这种简单的类型系统是不够的，并且无法防止简单的错误。考虑类型级自然数和长度索引向量的示例：

trans-unit.source: Strict functions are good for space usage, as they are for time, as discussed in the previous section. Strict functions get right down to business, rather than filling up the heap with closures (the system’s notes to itself about how to evaluate something, should it eventually be required).
trans-unit.target: 如上一节所述，严格的函数既有利于空间使用，又有利于时间使用。严格的功能可以直接用于业务，而不是用闭包填充堆（系统对自身的注释是如何评估某些东西，如果最终需要的话）。

trans-unit.source: Strictly speaking, -main-is is not a link-phase flag at all; it has no effect on the link step. The flag must be specified when compiling the module containing the specified main function (e.g. module A in the latter two items above). It has no effect for other modules, and hence can safely be given to ghc --make. However, if all the modules are otherwise up to date, you may need to force recompilation both of the module where the new “main” is, and of the module where the “main” function used to be; ghc is not clever enough to figure out that they both need recompiling. You can force recompilation by removing the object file, or by using the -fforce-recomp flag.
trans-unit.target: 严格来说， -main-is 根本不是链接阶段标志；它对链接步骤没有影响。在编译包含指定主功能的模块时必须指定该标志（例如，以上后两项中的模块 A ）。它对其他模块没有影响，因此可以放心地给 ghc --make 。但是，如果所有模块都是最新的，则可能需要强制重新编译新的“主”功能所在的模块和以前的“主”功能所在的模块； ghc 不够聪明，无法确定它们都需要重新编译。您可以通过删除目标文件或使用 -fforce-recomp 标志来强制重新编译。

trans-unit.source: Suppose we have two uses of a type constructor, each applied to the same parameters except for one difference. (For example, T Age Bool c and T Int Bool c for some type T.) The role of a type parameter says what we need to know about the two differing type arguments in order to know that the two outer types have the same representation (in the example, what must be true about Age and Int in order to show that T Age Bool c has the same representation as T Int Bool c).
trans-unit.target: 假设我们有两种使用类型构造函数的方法，每种方法都应用于相同的参数，只是有一个区别。 （例如，对于某些类型 T ， T Age Bool c 和 T Int Bool c 。）类型参数的作用表明我们需要了解两个不同的类型参数，以便知道两个外部类型具有相同的表示形式（在示例中，关于 Age 和 Int 必须是正确的，以显示 T Age Bool c 具有与 T Int Bool c 相同的表示形式）。

trans-unit.source: Systems such as information flow control security, capability based security systems and DSLs for working with encrypted data.. etc can be built in the Haskell language as a library. However they require guarantees about the properties of Haskell that aren’t true in general due to the presence of functions like unsafePerformIO. Safe Haskell gives users enough guarantees about the type system to allow them to build such secure systems.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用Haskell语言作为库来构建诸如信息流控制安全性，基于功能的安全性系统以及用于处理加密数据的DSL等系统。但是，由于存在诸如 unsafePerformIO 之类的函数，因此它们要求对Haskell的属性进行保证通常是不正确的。Safe Haskell为用户提供了有关类型系统的足够保证，以使他们能够构建这样的安全系统。

trans-unit.source: Takes an array and a list of pairs and returns an array identical to the left argument except that it has been updated by the associations in the right argument. For example, if m is a 1-origin, n by n matrix, then m//[((i,i), 0) | i <- [1..n]] is the same matrix, except with the diagonal zeroed.

trans-unit.source: Tell the linker to avoid shared Haskell libraries, if possible. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话,告诉链接器避免共享 Haskell 库。这是默认的。

trans-unit.source: Tell the linker to split the single object file that would normally be generated into multiple object files, one per top-level Haskell function or type in the module. This only makes sense for libraries, where it means that executables linked against the library are smaller as they only link against the object files that they need. However, assembling all the sections separately is expensive, so this is slower than compiling normally. Additionally, the size of the library itself (the .a file) can be a factor of 2 to 2.5 larger.
trans-unit.target: 告诉链接器将通常会生成的单个目标文件拆分为多个目标文件，每个顶级Haskell函数或在模块中键入一个。这仅对库有意义，这意味着与库链接的可执行文件较小，因为它们仅与所需的目标文件链接。但是，单独组装所有部分非常昂贵，因此这比正常编译慢。此外，库本身（ .a 文件）的大小可以大2到2.5倍。

trans-unit.source: Tells GHC not to collect information about how often functions are entered at runtime (the “entries” column of the time profile), for this module. This tends to make the profiled code run faster, and hence closer to the speed of the unprofiled code, because GHC is able to optimise more aggressively if it doesn’t have to maintain correct entry counts. This option can be useful if you aren’t interested in the entry counts (for example, if you only intend to do heap profiling).
trans-unit.target: 告诉GHC不要为此模块收集有关在运行时输入功能的频率的信息（时间配置文件的“条目”列）。这倾向于使已分析的代码运行更快，从而更接近未分析的代码的速度，因为GHC不必维护正确的条目计数就能够更积极地进行优化。如果您对条目数不感兴趣（例如，如果您仅打算进行堆分析），则此选项很有用。

trans-unit.source: Tells GHC that the module being compiled forms part of unit ID ⟨unit-id⟩; internally, these keys are used to determine type equality and linker symbols. As of GHC 8.0, unit IDs must consist solely of alphanumeric characters, dashes, underscores and periods. GHC reserves the right to interpret other characters in a special way in later releases.
trans-unit.target: 告诉GHC,正在编译的模块构成单元ID⟨unit-id⟩的一部分;在内部,这些键用于确定类型平等和链接器符号。从GHC 8.0开始,单元ID必须只由字母数字字符、破折号、下划线和句号组成。GHC保留在以后的版本中以特殊方式解释其他字符的权利。

trans-unit.source: Tells GHC to ignore all inessential information when reading interface files. That is, even if M.hi contains unfolding or strictness information for a function, GHC will ignore that information.
trans-unit.target: 告诉GHC在读取接口文件时忽略所有无关紧要的信息。也就是说，即使 M.hi 包含某个功能的展开或严格性信息，GHC也会忽略该信息。

trans-unit.source: Tells GHC to omit all inessential information from the interface file generated for the module being compiled (say M). This means that a module importing M will see only the types of the functions that M exports, but not their unfoldings, strictness info, etc. Hence, for example, no function exported by M will be inlined into an importing module. The benefit is that modules that import M will need to be recompiled less often (only when M’s exports change their type, not when they change their implementation).
trans-unit.target: 告诉GHC忽略为正在编译的模块生成的接口文件中所有无关紧要的信息（例如M）。这意味着导入M的模块将仅看到M导出的函数的类型，而看不到它们的展开，严格性信息等。因此，例如，M导出的任何函数都不会内联到导入模块中。这样做的好处是，导入M的模块将需要减少重新编译的频率（仅当M的导出更改其类型时，而不是在其实现更改时）。

trans-unit.source: Tells GHC to omit heap checks when no allocation is being performed. While this improves binary sizes by about 5%, it also means that threads run in tight non-allocating loops will not get preempted in a timely fashion. If it is important to always be able to interrupt such threads, you should turn this optimization off. Consider also recompiling all libraries with this optimization turned off, if you need to guarantee interruptibility.
trans-unit.target: 告诉GHC在没有进行分配时省略堆检查。虽然这样做可以提高约5%的二进制大小,但这也意味着在紧密的非分配循环中运行的线程不会及时被抢占。如果总是能够中断这样的线程很重要,你应该关闭这个优化。如果你需要保证中断性,也可以考虑在关闭这个优化的情况下重新编译所有库。

trans-unit.source: Tells the system whether or not to set the SA_NOCLDSTOP flag when installing new signal handlers.
trans-unit.target: 告诉系统在安装新的信号处理程序时是否设置 SA_NOCLDSTOP 标志。

trans-unit.source: Template Haskell allows you to do compile-time meta-programming in Haskell. The background to the main technical innovations is discussed in “Template Meta-programming for Haskell” (Proc Haskell Workshop 2002).
trans-unit.target: 模板Haskell允许您在Haskell中进行编译时元编程。“ Haskell的模板元编程 ”（Proc Haskell Workshop 2002）中讨论了主要技术创新的背景。

trans-unit.source: Template Haskell cannot know what the argument to add1 will be at the function’s definition site, so a lifting mechanism is used to promote x into a value of type Q Exp. This functionality is exposed to the user as the Lift typeclass in the Language.Haskell.TH.Syntax module. If a type has a Lift instance, then any of its values can be lifted to a Template Haskell expression:
trans-unit.target: 模板Haskell无法知道 add1 的参数在函数的定义位置将是什么，因此使用提升机制将 x 提升为 Q Exp 类型的值。此功能作为 Language.Haskell.TH.Syntax 模块中的 Lift 类型类向用户公开。如果类型具有 Lift 实例，则可以将其任何值提升为Template Haskell表达式：

trans-unit.source: Template Haskell has no way of knowing what value x will take on at splice-time, so it requires the type of x to be an instance of Lift.
trans-unit.target: 模板Haskell无法知道 x 在拼接时将取什么值，因此它要求 x 的类型为 Lift 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Template Haskell has the following new syntactic constructions. You need to use the extension TemplateHaskell to switch these syntactic extensions on. Alternatively, the TemplateHaskellQuotes extension can be used to enable the quotation subset of Template Haskell (i.e. without splice syntax). The TemplateHaskellQuotes extension is considered safe under Safe Haskell while TemplateHaskell is not.
trans-unit.target: 模板Haskell具有以下新的语法构造。您需要使用扩展 TemplateHaskell 来打开这些语法扩展。或者，可以使用 TemplateHaskellQuotes 扩展名启用模板Haskell的报价子集（即，不使用拼接语法）。在Safe Haskell下， TemplateHaskellQuotes 扩展被认为是安全的，而 TemplateHaskell 则不是。

trans-unit.source: Template Haskell relies on GHC’s built-in bytecode compiler and interpreter to run the splice expressions. The bytecode interpreter runs the compiled expression on top of the same runtime on which GHC itself is running; this means that the compiled code referred to by the interpreted expression must be compatible with this runtime, and in particular this means that object code that is compiled for profiling cannot be loaded and used by a splice expression, because profiled object code is only compatible with the profiling version of the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 模板Haskell依靠GHC的内置字节码编译器和解释器来运行拼接表达式。字节码解释器在运行GHC本身的同一运行时之上运行编译的表达式。这意味着解释表达式所引用的已编译代码必须与此运行时兼容，尤其是这意味着为概要分析而编译的目标代码无法被拼接表达式加载和使用，因为已剖析的目标代码仅与运行时的分析版本。

trans-unit.source: Template Haskell return values
trans-unit.target: 模板Haskell返回值

trans-unit.source: Template Haskell splices won’t be checked for warnings, because the code causing the warning might originate from a third-party library and possibly was not written by the user. If you want to have warnings for splices anyway, pass -fenable-th-splice-warnings.

Template Haskell supports quasiquoting, which permits users to construct program fragments by directly writing concrete syntax. A quasiquoter is essentially a function with takes a string to a Template Haskell AST. This module defines the QuasiQuoter datatype, which specifies a quasiquoter q which can be invoked using the syntax [q| ... string to parse ... |] when the QuasiQuotes language extension is enabled, and some utility functions for manipulating quasiquoters. Nota bene: this package does not define any parsers, that is up to you.
trans-unit.target: Haskell模板支持准引用，它允许用户通过直接编写具体语法来构造程序片段。准引号实际上是一个将字符串带到Template Haskell AST的函数。该模块定义了 QuasiQuoter 数据类型，它指定一个quasiquoter q 这可以使用语法调用 [q| ... string to parse ... |] 当 QuasiQuotes 语言扩展被启用，以及用于操纵quasiquoters一些实用功能。注意：此程序包未定义任何解析器，具体取决于您。

trans-unit.source: Template Haskell works in any mode (--make, --interactive, or file-at-a-time). There used to be a restriction to the former two, but that restriction has been lifted.
trans-unit.target: 模板哈斯克尔工作在任何模式下（ --make ， --interactive ，或文件在-A-时间）。以前对前两者有一个限制，但是该限制已取消。

trans-unit.source: Terminfo contains many string capabilities for special effects. For example, the cuu1 capability moves the cursor up one line; on ANSI terminals this is accomplished by printing the control sequence "\ESC[A". However, some older terminals also require "padding", or short pauses, after certain commands. For example, when TERM=vt100 the cuu1 capability is "\ESC[A$<2>", which instructs terminfo to pause for two milliseconds after outputting the control sequence.
trans-unit.target: Terminfo包含许多用于特殊效果的字符串功能。例如， cuu1 功能将光标向上移动一行；在ANSI终端上，这可以通过打印控制序列 "\ESC[A" 。但是，在某些命令之后，某些较旧的终端也需要“填充”或短暂的暂停。例如，当 TERM=vt100 时， cuu1 能力为 "\ESC[A$<2>" ，它指示terminfo在输出控制序列后暂停两毫秒。

trans-unit.target: 也就是说，要使变量⟨v⟩与模式 ( ⟨exp⟩- -> ⟨pat⟩ ) 相匹配，求值 ( ⟨exp⟩⟨v⟩ ) 并将结果与​​⟨pat⟩相匹配。

trans-unit.source: That is, we add a new form of pattern, written ⟨expression⟩ -> ⟨pattern⟩ that means “apply the expression to whatever we’re trying to match against, and then match the result of that application against the pattern”. The expression can be any Haskell expression of function type, and view patterns can be used wherever patterns are used.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，我们添加了一种新的模式形式，写为⟨expression⟩- -> ⟨pattern⟩，这意味着“将表达式应用于我们要匹配的对象，然后将该应用程序的结果与该模式匹配”。该表达式可以是函数类型的任何Haskell表达式，并且无论使用哪种模式，都可以使用视图模式。

trans-unit.source: That is, we represent every functional dependency (FD) a1 .. an -> b by an FD type family F a1 .. an and a superclass context equality F a1 .. an ~ b, essentially giving a name to the functional dependency. In class instances, we define the type instances of FD families in accordance with the class head. Method signatures are not affected by that process.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，我们用FD类型族 F a1 .. an 和超类上下文相等 F a1 .. an ~ b an〜b 表示每个功能依赖项（FD） a1 .. an -> b b，本质上为功能依赖项命名。在类实例中，我们根据类头定义FD系列的类型实例。方法签名不受该过程的影响。

trans-unit.source: The "live" elements of the buffer are those between the bufL and bufR offsets. In an empty buffer, bufL is equal to bufR, but they might not be zero: for example, the buffer might correspond to a memory-mapped file and in which case bufL will point to the next location to be written, which is not necessarily the beginning of the file.

trans-unit.source: The TypeApplications extension allows you to use visible type application in expressions. Here is an example: show (read @Int "5"). The @Int is the visible type application; it specifies the value of the type variable in read‘s type.
trans-unit.target: 该 TypeApplications 扩展允许您使用可视类型的应用程序中的表达式。这是一个示例： show (read @Int "5") 。该 @Int 是可见类型的应用程序; 它以 read 的类型指定type变量的值。

trans-unit.source: The TypeApplications extension allows you to use visible type application in expressions. Here is an example: show (read @Int "5"). The @Int is the visible type application; it specifies the value of the type variable in read’s type.
The UndecidableInstances extension is also used to lift some of the restrictions imposed on type family instances. See Decidability of type synonym instances.

trans-unit.source: The -Wmissing-export-lists flag will warn that M does not declare an export list. Declaring an explicit export list for M enables GHC dead code analysis, prevents accidental export of names and can ease optimizations like inlining.
trans-unit.target: 该 -Wmissing-export-lists 标志将警告说， M 不声明导出列表。声明 M 的显式导出列表可启用GHC死代码分析，防止名称的意外导出，并可简化诸如内联的优化。

trans-unit.source: The -Wmissing-import-lists flag will warn about the import of Y but not X If module Y is later changed to export (say) f, then the reference to f in M will become ambiguous. No warning is produced for the import of Z because extending Z‘s exports would be unlikely to produce ambiguity in M.
trans-unit.target: 该 -Wmissing-import-lists 标志警告的进口 Y 但不是 X 如果模块 Y 被后来改为出口（说） f ，则参考 f 在 M 会变得模糊。 Z 的进口没有发出警告，因为扩大 Z 的出口不太可能在 M 中产生歧义。

trans-unit.source: The -Wmissing-import-lists flag will warn about the import of Y but not X If module Y is later changed to export (say) f, then the reference to f in M will become ambiguous. No warning is produced for the import of Z because extending Z’s exports would be unlikely to produce ambiguity in M.

trans-unit.source: The -interactive-print ⟨expr⟩ flag allows to specify any function of type C a => a -> IO (), for some constraint C, as the function for printing evaluated expressions. The function can reside in any loaded module or any registered package, but only when it resides in a registered package will it survive a :cd, :add, :load, :reload or, :set.
trans-unit.target: 所述 -interactive-print ⟨expr⟩ 标志允许指定类型的任何功能 C a => a -> IO () ，对于一些约束 C ，作为函数用于打印计算的表达式。该函数可以驻留在任何已加载的模块或任何已注册的程序包中，但是只有当它驻留在已注册的程序包中时，它才能在 :cd ， :add ， :load ， :reload 或 :set 中生存。

The -v option makes GHC verbose: it reports its version number and shows (on stderr) exactly how it invokes each phase of the compilation system. Moreover, it passes the -v flag to most phases; each reports its version number (and possibly some other information).
trans-unit.target: 该 -v 选项使得GHC 详细：报告其版本号表示了（在stderr）究竟如何调用编译系统的各个阶段。而且，它将 -v 标志传递到大多数阶段。每个报告其版本号（可能还报告其他信息）。

trans-unit.target: 在 :list 时，单步，看到您当前所在的命令特别有用：

trans-unit.source: The :list command lists the source code around the current breakpoint. If your output device supports it, then GHCi will highlight the active subexpression in bold.
trans-unit.target: 的 :list 命令列出围绕当前断点的源代码。如果您的输出设备支持它，则GHCi将以粗体突出显示活动的子表达式。

trans-unit.target: 的 :set 指令修改两者，但也有一个 :seti 命令（“集互动”）的影响仅设置了互动选择。

trans-unit.source: The :set command sets two types of options: GHCi options, which begin with “+”, and “command-line” options, which begin with “-“.
The :set command sets two types of options: GHCi options, which begin with “+”, and “command-line” options, which begin with “-”.
trans-unit.target: 所述 :set 命令组的两个类型的选项：选项GHCI，这与“开头 + ”和“命令行”选项，其中与开始“ - ”。

trans-unit.source: The :trace command can be used with or without an expression. When used without an expression, tracing begins from the current breakpoint, just like :step.
trans-unit.target: 的 :trace 命令可以使用或不表达来使用。当不带表达式使用时，跟踪从当前断点开始，就像 :step 一样。

trans-unit.source: The :type-at command requires :set +c to be set.
trans-unit.target: 的 :type-at 命令要求 :set +c 被设置。

trans-unit.source: The :uses command requires :set +c to be set.
trans-unit.target: 的 :uses 命令要求 :set +c 被设置。

trans-unit.source: The INLINE pragma has the additional effect of making the function body look small, so that when inlining is allowed it is very likely to happen.
trans-unit.target: 该 INLINE 编译具有使函数体看起来很小的附加效果，所以当内联允许就很有可能发生。

trans-unit.source: The NOINLINE pragma does exactly what you’d expect: it stops the named function from being inlined by the compiler. You shouldn’t ever need to do this, unless you’re very cautious about code size.
trans-unit.target: 该 NOINLINE 编译不正是你所期望的：它停止从编译器被内联命名的功能。除非您对代码大小非常谨慎，否则您永远不需要这样做。

trans-unit.source: The RULES pragma lets you specify rewrite rules. It is described in Rewrite rules.
trans-unit.target: 该 RULES 编译允许您指定重写规则。在重写规则中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: The -F ⟨factor⟩ setting will be automatically reduced by the garbage collector when the maximum heap size (the -M ⟨size⟩ setting) is approaching.
trans-unit.target: 当 -F ⟨factor⟩ 最大堆大小（ -M ⟨size⟩ 设置）时，垃圾收集器会自动减少-F⟨factor⟩设置。

trans-unit.source: The -P option produces a more detailed report containing the actual time and allocation data as well. (Not used much.)
trans-unit.target: 所述 -P 选项产生包含实际时间和分配数据，以及更详细的报告。（使用不多。）

trans-unit.source: The -p option produces a standard time profile report. It is written into the file <stem>.prof; the stem is taken to be the program name by default, but can be overridden by the -po ⟨stem⟩ flag.
trans-unit.target: 该 -p 选项生成一个标准的时间分布报告。它被写入文件 <stem>.prof 中；默认情况下，词干为程序名称，但可以用 -po ⟨stem⟩ 标志覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The -pa option produces the most detailed report containing all cost centres in addition to the actual time and allocation data.
trans-unit.target: 该 -pa 选项生成一个包含所有成本中心除了实际时间和分配数据的最详细的报告。

trans-unit.source: The -pj option produces a time/allocation profile report in JSON format written into the file <program>.prof.
trans-unit.target: 所述 -pj 选项产生JSON格式写入到该文件的时间/分配概况报告 <program>.prof 。

trans-unit.source: The -po ⟨stem⟩ option overrides the stem used to form the output file paths for the cost-centre profiler (see -p and -pj flags above) and heap profiler (see -h).
trans-unit.target: 所述 -po ⟨stem⟩ 选项覆盖用于形成成本中心分析器输出文件路径（见茎 -p 和 -pj 标志以上）和堆分析器（见 -h ）。

trans-unit.source: The System.IO input functions (e.g. getLine) don't automatically convert to Unicode, so this function is provided to make the conversion from a multibyte string in the given code page to a proper Unicode string. To get the code page for the console, use getCurrentCodePage.
trans-unit.target: 该System.IO输入功能（如 getLine ）不会自动转换为Unicode，所以提供了这个功能，使从给定的代码页中的多字节字符串到一个适当的Unicode字符串转换。要获取控制台的代码页，请使用 getCurrentCodePage 。

trans-unit.source: The System.IO output functions (e.g. putStr) don't automatically convert to multibyte string on Windows, so this function is provided to make the conversion from a Unicode string in the given code page to a proper multibyte string. To get the code page for the console, use getCurrentCodePage.
trans-unit.target: 该System.IO输出功能（如 putStr ）不会自动转换为Windows上多字节字符串，所以提供了这个功能，使从给定的代码页中的Unicode字符串转换为一个适当的多字节字符串。要获取控制台的代码页，请使用 getCurrentCodePage 。

trans-unit.source: The System.IO input functions (e.g. getLine) don't automatically convert to Unicode, so this function is provided to make the conversion from a multibyte string in the given code page to a proper Unicode string. To get the code page for the console, use getCurrentCodePage.

The System.IO output functions (e.g. putStr) don't automatically convert to multibyte string on Windows, so this function is provided to make the conversion from a Unicode string in the given code page to a proper multibyte string. To get the code page for the console, use getCurrentCodePage.

The LLVM code generator can sometimes do a far better job at producing fast code than the native code generator. This is not universal and depends on the code. Numeric heavy code seems to show the best improvement when compiled via LLVM. You can also experiment with passing specific flags to LLVM with the -optlo ⟨option⟩ and -optlc ⟨option⟩ flags. Be careful though as setting these flags stops GHC from setting its usual flags for the LLVM optimiser and compiler.
trans-unit.target: 该LLVM代码生成器有时在比生产快的代码做一个更好的工作的本地代码生成器。这不是通用的，取决于代码。通过LLVM进行编译时，数字沉重的代码似乎显示出最佳的改进。您还可以尝试通过 -optlo ⟨option⟩ 和 -optlc ⟨option⟩ 将特定标志传递给LLVM 。请注意，尽管设置这些标志会阻止GHC为LLVM优化器和编译器设置其常规标志。

trans-unit.source: The GHC.Err module defines the code for the wired-in error functions, which have a special type in the compiler (with "open tyvars").
trans-unit.target: 所述GHC.Err模块定义了该代码的有线中的误差函数，其中有一个特殊类型的编译器（用“开放tyvars”）。

trans-unit.source: The Template Haskell staging restrictions apply to the expression being annotated with, so for example you cannot run a function from the module being compiled.
trans-unit.target: 该模板哈斯克尔分级限制适用于被注释与表达，因此，例如，你不能运行从模块的功能被编译。

trans-unit.source: The Template Haskell page on the GHC Wiki has a wealth of information. You may also consult the Haddock reference documentation <Language.Haskell.TH.>. Many changes to the original design are described in Notes on Template Haskell version 2. Not all of these changes are in GHC, however.
trans-unit.target: 该模板哈斯克尔在GHC的维基页面有大量的信息。您也可以查阅Haddock参考文档<Language.Haskell.TH。>。在模板Haskell版本2的注释中描述了对原始设计的许多更改。但是，并非所有这些变化都在GHC中。

trans-unit.source: The GHC.Compact module provides a way to make garbage collection more efficient for long-lived data structures. Compacting a data structure collects the objects together in memory, where they are treated as a single object by the garbage collector and not traversed individually.

The GHC.Compact module provides a way to make garbage collection more efficient for long-lived data structures. Compacting a data structure collects the objects together in memory, where they are treated as a single object by the garbage collector and not traversed individually.
trans-unit.target: 该GHC.Compact模块提供了一种方法，使垃圾收集长期数据结构更加高效。压缩数据结构会将这些对象收集在内存中，在内存中，垃圾回收器将它们视为单个对象，而不是单独遍历。

trans-unit.source: The System.IO library manages multiplexing in its own way. On Windows systems it uses safe foreign calls to ensure that threads doing I/O operations don't block the whole runtime, whereas on Unix systems all the currently blocked I/O requests are managed by a single thread (the IO manager thread) using a mechanism such as epoll or kqueue, depending on what is provided by the host operating system.
trans-unit.target: 该System.IO图书馆负责复用自己的方式。在Windows系统上，它使用 safe 外部调用来确保执行I / O操作的线程不会阻塞整个运行时，而在Unix系统上，所有当前阻塞的I / O请求都由单个线程（IO管理器线程）使用一种机制，例如 epoll 或 kqueue ，取决于主机操作系统提供的内容。

trans-unit.source: The Text.Read library is the canonical library to import for Read-class facilities. For GHC only, it offers an extended and much improved Read class, which constitutes a proposed alternative to the Haskell 2010 Read. In particular, writing parsers is easier, and the parsers are much more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 该Text.Read库是规范的库导入用于 Read -class设施。仅针对GHC，它提供了扩展的且经过改进的 Read 类，它构成了Haskell 2010 Read 的建议替代方案。特别是，编写解析器更加容易，而解析器则更加高效。

trans-unit.source: The --numa flag is typically beneficial when a program is using all cores of a large multi-core NUMA system, with a large allocation area (-A). All memory accesses to the allocation area will go to local memory, which can save a significant amount of remote memory access. A runtime speedup on the order of 10% is typical, but can vary a lot depending on the hardware and the memory behaviour of the program.
trans-unit.target: 当程序使用具有较大分配区域（ -A ）的大型多核NUMA系统的所有核时，-- --numa 标志通常非常有用。对分配区域的所有内存访问都将进入本地内存，这可以节省大量的远程内存访问。通常，运行时加速会达到10％左右，但取决于硬件和程序的内存行为，其运行速度可能会有很大差异。

trans-unit.source: The -qn flag may be useful when running with a large -A value (so that GC is infrequent), and a large -N value (so as to make use of hyperthreaded cores, for example). For example, on a 24-core machine with 2 hyperthreads per core, we might use -N48 -qn24 -A128m to specify that the mutator should use hyperthreads but the GC should only use real cores. Note that this configuration would use 6GB for the allocation area.
trans-unit.target: 所述 -qn 具有大运行时，标志可以是有用的 -A 值（使得GC是不频繁），和一个大 -N 值（以便使用超线程核的，例如）。例如，在每个内核有2个超线程的24内核计算机上，我们可以使用 -N48 -qn24 -A128m 来指定mutator应该使用超线程，而GC应该仅使用真实内核。请注意，此配置将使用6GB作为分配区域。

trans-unit.source: The Monad class defines the basic operations over a monad, a concept from a branch of mathematics known as category theory. From the perspective of a Haskell programmer, however, it is best to think of a monad as an abstract datatype of actions. Haskell's do expressions provide a convenient syntax for writing monadic expressions.

trans-unit.source: The foldM function is analogous to foldl, except that its result is encapsulated in a monad. Note that foldM works from left-to-right over the list arguments. This could be an issue where (>>) and the `folded function' are not commutative.
trans-unit.target: 该 foldM 函数类似于 foldl ，不同之处在于它的结果被封装在单子。请注意， foldM 在列表参数上从左到右起作用。这可能是 (>>) 和“折叠函数”不可交换的问题。

trans-unit.source: The join function is the conventional monad join operator. It is used to remove one level of monadic structure, projecting its bound argument into the outer level.
trans-unit.target: 该 join 的功能是传统的单子连接操作。它用于删除单子结构的一个级别，将其绑定参数投射到外部级别。

trans-unit.source: The mapAndUnzipM function maps its first argument over a list, returning the result as a pair of lists. This function is mainly used with complicated data structures or a state monad.
trans-unit.target: 该 mapAndUnzipM 函数的第一个参数映射了一个列表，返回结果为一对列表。此功能主要用于复杂的数据结构或状态monad。

trans-unit.source: The zipWithM function generalizes zipWith to arbitrary applicative functors.
trans-unit.target: 该 zipWithM 功能概括 zipWith 任意应用性函子。

trans-unit.source: The Monad class defines the basic operations over a monad, a concept from a branch of mathematics known as category theory. From the perspective of a Haskell programmer, however, it is best to think of a monad as an abstract datatype of actions. Haskell's do expressions provide a convenient syntax for writing monadic expressions.
trans-unit.target: 该 Monad 类定义的基本操作在单子从被称为数学的一个分支，一个概念范畴论。但是，从Haskell程序员的角度来看，最好将monad视为动作的抽象数据类型。Haskell的 do 表达式为编写单子表达式提供了一种方便的语法。

trans-unit.source: The Reader monad (also called the Environment monad). Represents a computation, which can read values from a shared environment, pass values from function to function, and execute sub-computations in a modified environment. Using Reader monad for such computations is often clearer and easier than using the State monad.
trans-unit.target: 该 Reader 单子（也称为环境单子）。表示一种计算，该计算可以从共享环境中读取值，在函数之间传递值，以及在修改后的环境中执行子计算。与使用 State monad 相比，使用 Reader monad进行这样的计算通常更容易。

trans-unit.target: 该 catchE 操作具有更复杂的类型，所以我们需要使用专用的升降功能 liftCatch 大多数单子变压器提供。在这里，我们使用 ReaderT 版本，然后使用 StateT 版本：

trans-unit.source: The MaybeT monad transformer extends a monad with the ability to exit the computation without returning a value.
trans-unit.target: 该 MaybeT 单子转换扩展与退出的计算不返回值的能力的单子。

trans-unit.source: The accumArray function deals with repeated indices in the association list using an accumulating function which combines the values of associations with the same index.
trans-unit.target: 所述 accumArray 与使用在所述关联列表中重复指数函数优惠累积功能相结合的关联的值具有相同的索引。

trans-unit.source: The bifind function takes a predicate and a structure and returns the leftmost element of the structure matching the predicate, or Nothing if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 bifind 函数采用一个谓语和结构，并返回该结构的最左边的元素相匹配的谓词，或者 Nothing 如果不存在这样的元件。

trans-unit.source: The biproduct function computes the product of the numbers of a structure.
trans-unit.target: 该 biproduct 函数计算结构的数的乘积。

trans-unit.source: The bisum function computes the sum of the numbers of a structure.
trans-unit.target: 该 bisum 函数计算结构的数的总和。

trans-unit.source: The Binary class provides put and get, methods to encode and decode a Haskell value to a lazy ByteString. It mirrors the Read and Show classes for textual representation of Haskell types, and is suitable for serialising Haskell values to disk, over the network.
trans-unit.target: 该 Binary 类提供 put 和 get ，方法进行编码和解码Haskell的价值懒惰 ByteString 。它镜像了 Read 和 Show 类，以用于Haskell类型的文本表示，并且适用于通过网络将Haskell值序列化到磁盘上。

trans-unit.source: The Get monad. A monad for efficiently building structures from encoded lazy ByteStrings.
trans-unit.target: 在 Get 单子。用于从编码的惰性ByteString有效地构建结构的monad。

trans-unit.source: The bimapAccumL function behaves like a combination of bimap and bifoldl; it traverses a structure from left to right, threading a state of type a and using the given actions to compute new elements for the structure.
trans-unit.target: 所述 bimapAccumL 函数的行为等的组合 bimap 的和 bifoldl ; 它遍历从左至右，穿线型的状态的结构 a 并使用给定的操作来计算结构的新元素。

trans-unit.source: The bimapAccumR function behaves like a combination of bimap and bifoldl; it traverses a structure from right to left, threading a state of type a and using the given actions to compute new elements for the structure.
trans-unit.target: 所述 bimapAccumR 函数的行为等的组合 bimap 的和 bifoldl ; 它从右到左遍历一个结构，对类型 a 的状态进行线程化，并使用给定的动作为该结构计算新元素。

trans-unit.source: The Bits class defines bitwise operations over integral types.
trans-unit.target: 该 Bits 类定义按位在整数类型的操作。

trans-unit.source: The FiniteBits class denotes types with a finite, fixed number of bits.
trans-unit.target: 所述 FiniteBits 类表示具有有限的，固定数量的比特的类型。

trans-unit.source: The Bool type and related functions.
trans-unit.target: 在 Bool 类型和相关功能。

trans-unit.source: The findIndex function takes a predicate and a ByteString and returns the index of the first element in the ByteString satisfying the predicate.
trans-unit.target: 所述 findIndex 函数采用一个谓语和一个 ByteString ，并返回第一个元素的索引中满足谓词的字节串。

trans-unit.source: The findIndices function extends findIndex, by returning the indices of all elements satisfying the predicate, in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 该 findIndices 功能扩展 findIndex ，通过返回满足谓词的所有元素的索引，按升序排列。

trans-unit.source: The groupBy function is the non-overloaded version of group.
trans-unit.target: 的 groupBy 功能是与非过负荷版本的 group 。

trans-unit.source: The mapAccumL function behaves like a combination of map and foldl; it applies a function to each element of a ByteString, passing an accumulating parameter from left to right, and returning a final value of this accumulator together with the new list.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mapAccumL 函数的行为的组合等 map 和 foldl ; 它将一个函数应用于ByteString的每个元素，从左到右传递一个累加参数，并返回该累加器的最终值以及新列表。

trans-unit.source: The mapAccumR function behaves like a combination of map and foldr; it applies a function to each element of a ByteString, passing an accumulating parameter from right to left, and returning a final value of this accumulator together with the new ByteString.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mapAccumR 函数的行为的组合等 map 和 foldr 相似 ; 它将一个函数应用于ByteString的每个元素，从右到左传递一个累加参数，并返回该累加器的最终值以及新的ByteString。

trans-unit.target: 该 transpose 功能调换它的行和列 ByteString 参数。

trans-unit.source: The BufferWriter itself is an IO action: you supply it with a buffer (as a pointer and length) and it will write data into the buffer. It returns a number indicating how many bytes were actually written (which can be 0). It also returns a Next which describes what comes next.
trans-unit.target: 所述 BufferWriter 本身是一个IO动作：你用缓冲液提供它（作为一个指针和长度）和将数据写入到缓冲器中。它返回一个数字，指示实际写入了多少个字节（可以为 0 ）。它还返回一个 Next ，描述下一步。

trans-unit.source: The Data class comprehends a fundamental primitive gfoldl for folding over constructor applications, say terms. This primitive can be instantiated in several ways to map over the immediate subterms of a term; see the gmap combinators later in this class. Indeed, a generic programmer does not necessarily need to use the ingenious gfoldl primitive but rather the intuitive gmap combinators. The gfoldl primitive is completed by means to query top-level constructors, to turn constructor representations into proper terms, and to list all possible datatype constructors. This completion allows us to serve generic programming scenarios like read, show, equality, term generation.
trans-unit.target: 该 Data 类领悟一种基本的原始 gfoldl 的折叠构造应用程序，说条款。可以通过几种方式实例化该原语，以映射术语的直接子项。请参阅本课程后面的 gmap 组合器。实际上，通用程序员不一定需要使用巧妙的gfoldl原语，而需要使用直观的 gmap 组合器。该 gfoldl 原语的手段查询顶级构造完成后，把构造表示分为适当的条款，并列出所有可能的数据类型构造。这样的完成使我们能够为通用编程方案提供服务，例如阅读，展示，相等性，术语生成。

trans-unit.source: The Either type is sometimes used to represent a value which is either correct or an error; by convention, the Left constructor is used to hold an error value and the Right constructor is used to hold a correct value (mnemonic: "right" also means "correct").
trans-unit.target: 在 Either 类型有时被用来表示一个值，其是正确或错误; 按照惯例， Left 构造函数用于保存错误值，而 Right 构造函数用于保存正确的值（助记符：“ right”也表示“ correct”）。

trans-unit.source: The Either type represents values with two possibilities: a value of type Either a b is either Left a or Right b.
trans-unit.target: 在 Either 类型表示的值与两种可能性：type的值 Either a b 或者是 Left a 或 Right b 。

trans-unit.source: The Eq class defines equality (==) and inequality (/=). All the basic datatypes exported by the Prelude are instances of Eq, and Eq may be derived for any datatype whose constituents are also instances of Eq.
trans-unit.target: 的 Eq 类定义平等（ == ）和不等式（ /= ）。Prelude导出的所有基本数据类型都是 Eq 的实例，并且 Eq 可以针对其组成也是 Eq 的实例的任何数据类型派生。

trans-unit.source: The Int argument specifies a capability number (see getNumCapabilities). Typically capabilities correspond to physical processors, but the exact behaviour is implementation-dependent. The value passed to forkOn is interpreted modulo the total number of capabilities as returned by getNumCapabilities.

trans-unit.target: 所述 IntMap v 类型表示从型的键的有限地图（有时称为字典） Int 到类型的值 v 。

trans-unit.source: The IntMap type is shared between the lazy and strict modules, meaning that the same IntMap value can be passed to functions in both modules. This means that the Functor, Traversable and Data instances are the same as for the Data.IntMap.Lazy module, so if they are used the resulting map may contain suspended values (thunks).
trans-unit.target: 所述 IntMap 类型懒惰和严格的模块之间共享，这意味着相同 IntMap 值可以被传递给函数在这两个模块。这意味着 Functor ， Traversable 和 Data 实例与Data.IntMap.Lazy模块的实例相同，因此，如果使用它们，则生成的映射可能包含挂起的值（thunk）。

trans-unit.target: 所述 elemIndex 函数返回在给定列表的第一个元素的索引，其等于（由 == ）到查询元件，或 Nothing 如果不存在这样的元件。

trans-unit.target: 该 genericTake 函数是一个重载版本的 take ，它接受任何 Integral 值作为元素采取的数量。

trans-unit.source: The isInfixOf function takes two lists and returns True iff the first list is contained, wholly and intact, anywhere within the second.
trans-unit.target: 该 isInfixOf 函数有两个列表，并返回 True 当且仅当第一个名单载，完全和完整，第二个内的任何地方。

trans-unit.source: The isSubsequenceOf function takes two lists and returns True if all the elements of the first list occur, in order, in the second. The elements do not have to occur consecutively.

trans-unit.source: The mapAccumL function behaves like a combination of fmap and foldl; it applies a function to each element of a structure, passing an accumulating parameter from left to right, and returning a final value of this accumulator together with the new structure.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mapAccumL 函数的行为等的组合 fmap 和 foldl ; 它将函数应用于结构的每个元素，从左到右传递一个累加参数，并返回该累加器的最终值以及新结构。

trans-unit.source: The mapAccumR function behaves like a combination of fmap and foldr; it applies a function to each element of a structure, passing an accumulating parameter from right to left, and returning a final value of this accumulator together with the new structure.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mapAccumR 函数的行为等的组合 fmap 和 foldr 相似 ; 它将一个函数应用于结构的每个元素，从右向左传递一个累加参数，并返回该累加器的最终值以及新结构。

trans-unit.source: The zip6 function takes six lists and returns a list of six-tuples, analogous to zip. It is capable of list fusion, but it is restricted to its first list argument and its resulting list.

trans-unit.source: The zip7 function takes seven lists and returns a list of seven-tuples, analogous to zip. It is capable of list fusion, but it is restricted to its first list argument and its resulting list.
trans-unit.target: 该 zip7 功能需要七名名单和返回的七元组的列表，类似于 zip 。它能够进行列表融合，但仅限于其第一个列表参数及其结果列表。

trans-unit.source: The inits function takes a stream xs and returns all the finite prefixes of xs.
trans-unit.target: 该 inits 函数接受一个流 xs 并返回所有的有限前缀 xs 。

trans-unit.source: The isPrefixOf function returns True if the first argument is a prefix of the second.
trans-unit.target: 该 isPrefixOf 函数返回 True 如果第一个参数是第二的前缀。

trans-unit.source: The nub function removes duplicate elements from a list. In particular, it keeps only the first occurrence of each element. (The name nub means 'essence'.) It is a special case of nubBy, which allows the programmer to supply their own inequality test.
trans-unit.target: 该 nub 功能从列表中移除重复的元素。特别是，它仅保留每个元素的第一次出现。（名称 nub 表示“本质”。）这是 nubBy 的特例，它允许程序员提供自己的不平等测试。

trans-unit.source: The nubBy function behaves just like nub, except it uses a user-supplied equality predicate instead of the overloaded == function.
trans-unit.target: 的 nubBy 功能行为就像 nub ，除了它使用一个用户提供的相等谓词来代替重载 == 功能。

trans-unit.source: The partition function takes a predicate p and a stream xs, and returns a pair of lists. The first list corresponds to the elements of xs for which p holds; the second corresponds to the elements of xs for which p does not hold.
trans-unit.target: 的 partition 函数采用一个谓词 p 和流 xs ，并返回一个对列表。第一个列表对应于 xs 的元素，其中 p 成立；第二个对应于 xs 的元素，其中 p 不成立。

trans-unit.source: The tails function takes a stream xs and returns all the suffixes of xs.
trans-unit.target: 在 tails 函数接受一个流 xs 并返回所有的后缀 xs 。

trans-unit.source: The unfoldr function is analogous to Data.List's unfoldr operation.

trans-unit.source: The unzip function is the inverse of the zip function.

trans-unit.source: The zip function takes two streams and returns a stream of corresponding pairs.
trans-unit.target: 的 zip 函数有两个流，并返回对应的对流。

trans-unit.source: The zipWith function generalizes zip. Rather than tupling the elements, the elements are combined using the function passed as the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 该 zipWith 功能概括 zip 。而不是组合元素，而是使用作为第一个参数传递的函数来组合元素。

trans-unit.source: The Map k v type represents a finite map (sometimes called a dictionary) from keys of type k to values of type v. A Map is strict in its keys but lazy in its values.
trans-unit.target: 的 Map k v 类型表示从型的键的有限地图（有时称为字典） k 到类型的值 v 。一个 Map 是在其键严格的，但在它的值懒惰。

trans-unit.source: The merge and mergeA functions are shared by the lazy and strict modules. Only the choice of merge tactics determines strictness. If you use mapMissing from Data.Map.Merge.Strict then the results will be forced before they are inserted. If you use mapMissing from this module then they will not.
trans-unit.target: 该 merge 和 mergeA 功能由懒惰和严格的模块共享。只有合并策略的选择才能确定严格性。如果您使用 mapMissing 的mapMissing，则将在插入结果之前强制结果。如果您在此模块中使用 mapMissing ，则不会。

trans-unit.source: The merge and mergeA functions are shared by the lazy and strict modules. Only the choice of merge tactics determines strictness. If you use mapMissing from this module then the results will be forced before they are inserted. If you use mapMissing from Data.Map.Merge.Lazy then they will not.
trans-unit.target: 该 merge 和 mergeA 功能由懒惰和严格的模块共享。只有合并策略的选择才能确定严格性。如果您从此模块中使用 mapMissing ，则将在插入结果之前强制执行结果。如果您使用 mapMissing 的mapMissing，则不会。

trans-unit.source: The Map k v type represents a finite map (sometimes called a dictionary) from keys of type k to values of type v.
trans-unit.target: 的 Map k v 类型表示从型的键的有限地图（有时称为字典） k 到类型的值 v 。

trans-unit.source: The Map type is shared between the lazy and strict modules, meaning that the same Map value can be passed to functions in both modules. This means that the Functor, Traversable and Data instances are the same as for the Data.Map.Lazy module, so if they are used the resulting maps may contain suspended values (thunks).
trans-unit.target: 的 Map 种类的懒惰和严格的模块之间共享，这意味着相同的 Map 值可以被传递给函数在这两个模块。这意味着 Functor ， Traversable 和 Data 实例与Data.Map.Lazy模块的实例相同，因此，如果使用它们，则生成的映射可能包含挂起的值（thunk）。

trans-unit.source: The Map type is shared between the lazy and strict modules, meaning that the same Map value can be passed to functions in both modules. This means that the Functor, Traversable and Data instances are the same as for the Data.Map.Lazy module, so if they are used the resulting maps may contain suspended values (thunks).

The Maybe type encapsulates an optional value. A value of type Maybe a either contains a value of type a (represented as Just a), or it is empty (represented as Nothing). Using Maybe is a good way to deal with errors or exceptional cases without resorting to drastic measures such as error.
trans-unit.target: 该 Maybe 类型封装了一个可选值。类型的值 Maybe a 或者包含类型的值 a （表示为 Just a ），或者它是空的（表示为 Nothing ）。使用 Maybe 是处理错误或特殊情况的好方法，而无需采取 error 严厉措施。

trans-unit.source: The Maybe type is also a monad. It is a simple kind of error monad, where all errors are represented by Nothing. A richer error monad can be built using the Either type.
trans-unit.target: 该 Maybe 类型也是一个单子。这是一种简单的错误单子，所有错误都由 Nothing 表示。可以使用 Either 类型构建更丰富的错误单子。

trans-unit.source: The catMaybes function takes a list of Maybes and returns a list of all the Just values.
trans-unit.target: 该 catMaybes 函数接受列表 Maybe S和返回所有的列表 Just 值。

trans-unit.source: The fromJust function extracts the element out of a Just and throws an error if its argument is Nothing.
trans-unit.target: 该 fromJust 函数提取的元素出来的 Just ，如果它的参数是抛出一个错误 Nothing 。

trans-unit.source: The fromMaybe function takes a default value and and Maybe value. If the Maybe is Nothing, it returns the default values; otherwise, it returns the value contained in the Maybe.
trans-unit.target: 该 fromMaybe 功能需要一个默认值，并 Maybe 值。如果 Maybe 为 Nothing ，则返回默认值；否则，返回默认值。否则，它返回 Maybe 中包含的值。

trans-unit.source: The isJust function returns True iff its argument is of the form Just _.
trans-unit.target: 该 isJust 函数返回 True 当且仅当它的参数是形式 Just _ 。

trans-unit.source: The isNothing function returns True iff its argument is Nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数为 Nothing ，则 isNothing 函数返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: The listToMaybe function returns Nothing on an empty list or Just a where a is the first element of the list.
trans-unit.target: 该 listToMaybe 函数返回 Nothing 空列表或 Just a ，其中 a 是列表的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The mapMaybe function is a version of map which can throw out elements. In particular, the functional argument returns something of type Maybe b. If this is Nothing, no element is added on to the result list. If it is Just b, then b is included in the result list.
trans-unit.target: 该 mapMaybe 功能是一个版本 map ，可以扔出去的元素。特别是，函数参数返回类型 Maybe b 东西。如果为 Nothing ，则不会将任何元素添加到结果列表。如果它是 Just b ，则 b 包含在结果列表中。

trans-unit.source: The maybe function takes a default value, a function, and a Maybe value. If the Maybe value is Nothing, the function returns the default value. Otherwise, it applies the function to the value inside the Just and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 在 maybe 的功能需要一个默认值，函数，和 Maybe 的值。如果 Maybe 值为 Nothing ，则该函数返回默认值。否则，它将函数应用于 Just 内的值并返回结果。

trans-unit.source: The maybeToList function returns an empty list when given Nothing or a singleton list when given Just.
trans-unit.target: 当给出 Nothing 时， maybeToList 函数返回一个空列表，而给出 Just 时，则返回一个单例列表。

trans-unit.source: The Sum monoid is defined by the numerical addition operator and `0` as neutral element:
trans-unit.target: 的 Sum 半群由数值加法运算符和定义`0`为中性元素：

trans-unit.source: The Down type allows you to reverse sort order conveniently. A value of type Down a contains a value of type a (represented as Down a). If a has an Ord instance associated with it then comparing two values thus wrapped will give you the opposite of their normal sort order. This is particularly useful when sorting in generalised list comprehensions, as in: then sortWith by Down x
trans-unit.target: 该 Down 类型，您可以方便地反向排序。类型为 Down a 的值包含类型 a a的值（表示为 Down a ）。如果 a 具有与之关联的 Ord 实例，则比较由此包装的两个值将得到与它们正常排序顺序相反的结果。在按广义列表 then sortWith by Down x 排序时，这特别有用，例如：then down by Down x

trans-unit.source: The Ord class is used for totally ordered datatypes.
trans-unit.target: 在 Ord 类用于全序数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The MinSemigroup instance for Int is defined to always pick the smaller number: >>> Min 1 <> Min 2 <> Min 3 <> Min 4 :: Min Int Min {getMin = 1}
trans-unit.target: 将 Int 的 Min Semigroup 实例定义为始终选择较小的数字：>>> Min 1 <> Min 2 <> Min 3 <> Min 4 :: Min Int Min {getMin = 1}

trans-unit.source: The Seq a type represents a finite sequence of values of type a.
trans-unit.target: 的 Seq a 类型表示类型的值的有限序列 a 。

trans-unit.source: The Set e type represents a set of elements of type e. Most operations require that e be an instance of the Ord class. A Set is strict in its elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Set e 类型表示一组类型的元素的 e 。大多数操作都要求 e 是 Ord 类的实例。一 Set 是在其元素严格。

trans-unit.source: The Set e type represents a set of elements of type e. Most operations require that e be an instance of the Ord class. A Set is strict in its elements.
The Text type is implemented using arrays that are not guaranteed to have a fixed address in the Haskell heap. All communication with native code must thus occur by copying data back and forth.
trans-unit.target: 的 Text 类型是使用不能保证在Haskell的堆的固定地址阵列实现。因此，所有与本机代码的通信都必须通过来回复制数据来进行。

trans-unit.source: The Text type's internal representation is UTF-16, using the platform's native endianness. This makes copied data suitable for use with native libraries that use a similar representation, such as ICU. To interoperate with native libraries that use different internal representations, such as UTF-8 or UTF-32, consider using the functions in the Encoding module.
trans-unit.target: 该 Text 类型的内部表现为UTF-16，使用平台的本机字节序。这使复制的数据适合与使用类似表示形式的本机库一起使用，例如ICU。要与使用不同内部表示形式的本机库（例如UTF-8或UTF-32）进行互操作，请考虑使用“ Encoding 模块中的函数。

trans-unit.source: The mapAccumR function behaves like a combination of map and a strict foldr; it applies a function to each element of a Text, passing an accumulating parameter from right to left, and returning a final value of this accumulator together with the new Text. Performs replacement on invalid scalar values.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mapAccumR 函数的行为的组合等 map 和一个严格 foldr 相似 ; 它将一个函数应用于 Text 的每个元素，从右到左传递一个累加参数，并返回该累加器的最终值以及新的 Text 。对无效的标量值执行替换。

trans-unit.source: The Array constructor is exposed since text-1.1.1.3
trans-unit.target: 该 Array 由于构造暴露 text-1.1.1.3

trans-unit.source: The MArray constructor is exposed since text-1.1.1.3
trans-unit.target: 该 MArray 因为构造暴露 text-1.1.1.3

trans-unit.source: The streamDecodeUtf8 and streamDecodeUtf8With functions accept a ByteString that represents a possibly incomplete input (e.g. a packet from a network stream) that may not end on a UTF-8 boundary.
trans-unit.target: 的 streamDecodeUtf8 和 streamDecodeUtf8With 函数接受一个 ByteString 表示一个可能不完整输入（例如，从网络流分组），其可以不是UTF-8边界结束。

trans-unit.source: The findIndex function takes a predicate and a stream and returns the index of the first element in the stream satisfying the predicate.
trans-unit.target: 所述 findIndex 函数采用一个谓语和流并返回第一个元素的索引满足谓词的信息流中。

trans-unit.source: The findIndexI function takes a predicate and a stream and returns the index of the first element in the stream satisfying the predicate.
trans-unit.target: 所述 findIndexI 函数采用一个谓语和流并返回第一个元素的索引满足谓词的信息流中。

trans-unit.source: The Size of n code points.
trans-unit.target: 该 Size 的 n 码点。

trans-unit.source: The Size of the given code point.
trans-unit.target: 给定代码点的 Size 。

trans-unit.source: The interact function takes a function of type Text -> Text as its argument. The entire input from the standard input device is passed to this function as its argument, and the resulting string is output on the standard output device.
trans-unit.target: 在 interact 功能需要类型的函数 Text -> Text 作为其参数。来自标准输入设备的全部输入作为其参数传递给此函数，并且结果字符串在标准输出设备上输出。

trans-unit.source: The readFile function reads a file and returns the contents of the file as a string. The entire file is read strictly, as with getContents.
trans-unit.target: 该 readFile 函数读取文件并返回该文件的内容作为字符串。与 getContents 一样，严格读取整个文件。

trans-unit.source: The group function takes a Text and returns a list of Texts such that the concatenation of the result is equal to the argument. Moreover, each sublist in the result contains only equal elements. For example,
trans-unit.target: 该 group 函数采用一个 Text ，并返回的列表 Text S，从而使结果的级联是等于参数。此外，结果中的每个子列表仅包含相等的元素。例如，

trans-unit.source: The groupBy function is the non-overloaded version of group.
trans-unit.target: 的 groupBy 功能是与非过负荷版本的 group 。

trans-unit.source: The mapAccumR function behaves like a combination of map and a strict foldr; it applies a function to each element of a Text, passing an accumulating parameter from right to left, and returning a final value of this accumulator together with the new Text. Performs replacement on invalid scalar values.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mapAccumR 函数的行为的组合等 map 和一个严格 foldr 相似 ; 它将一个函数应用于 Text 的每个元素，从右到左传递一个累加参数，并返回该累加器的最终值以及新的 Text 。对无效的标量值执行替换。

trans-unit.source: The interact function takes a function of type Text -> Text as its argument. The entire input from the standard input device is passed (lazily) to this function as its argument, and the resulting string is output on the standard output device.
trans-unit.target: 在 interact 功能需要类型的函数 Text -> Text 作为其参数。来自标准输入设备的整个输入（作为参数）（延迟地）传递给此函数，结果字符串在标准输出设备上输出。

trans-unit.source: The mapAccumL function behaves like a combination of fmap and foldl; it applies a function to each element of a structure, passing an accumulating parameter from left to right, and returning a final value of this accumulator together with the new structure.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mapAccumL 函数的行为等的组合 fmap 和 foldl ; 它将函数应用于结构的每个元素，从左到右传递一个累加参数，并返回该累加器的最终值以及新结构。

trans-unit.source: The mapAccumR function behaves like a combination of fmap and foldr; it applies a function to each element of a structure, passing an accumulating parameter from right to left, and returning a final value of this accumulator together with the new structure.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mapAccumR 函数的行为等的组合 fmap 和 foldr 相似 ; 它将一个函数应用于结构的每个元素，从右向左传递一个累加参数，并返回该累加器的最终值以及新结构。

trans-unit.source: The Forest a type represents a forest of Tree as.
trans-unit.target: 在 Forest a 类型代表的森林 Tree a 秒。

trans-unit.source: The Tree a type represents a lazy, possibly infinite, multi-way tree (also known as a rose tree).
trans-unit.target: 该 Tree a 类型代表一个懒惰的，可能是无限的，多路树（也被称为玫瑰树）。

trans-unit.source: The Typeable class reifies types to some extent by associating type representations to types. These type representations can be compared, and one can in turn define a type-safe cast operation. To this end, an unsafe cast is guarded by a test for type (representation) equivalence. The module Data.Dynamic uses Typeable for an implementation of dynamics. The module Data.Data uses Typeable and type-safe cast (but not dynamics) to support the "Scrap your boilerplate" style of generic programming.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Typeable 类按类型交涉类型相关联的类型具体化在一定程度上。可以对这些类型表示进行比较，然后可以依次定义一种类型安全的强制转换操作。为此，通过类型（表示）等效性测试来保护不安全的转换。Data.Dynamic模块将Typeable用于动态实现。Data.Data模块使用Typeable和类型安全的强制转换（但不使用动态转换）来支持通用编程的“废话”样式。

trans-unit.source: The trace function outputs the trace message given as its first argument, before returning the second argument as its result.
trans-unit.target: 该 trace 函数输出给定的作为第一个参数，返回第二自变量作为其结果之前跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: The trace function should only be used for debugging, or for monitoring execution. The function is not referentially transparent: its type indicates that it is a pure function but it has the side effect of outputting the trace message.
trans-unit.target: 该 trace 功能应仅用于调试，或用于监测执行。该函数不是参照透明的：其类型表明它是纯函数，但具有输出跟踪消息的副作用。

trans-unit.source: The trace, traceShow and traceIO functions print messages to an output stream. They are intended for "printf debugging", that is: tracing the flow of execution and printing interesting values.
trans-unit.target: 的 trace ， traceShow 和 traceIO 功能消息输出到输出流。它们用于“ printf调试”，即：跟踪执行流并打印有趣的值。

trans-unit.source: The traceEvent function behaves like trace with the difference that the message is emitted to the eventlog, if eventlog profiling is available and enabled at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 该 traceEvent 函数的行为就像 trace 与该消息被发射到事件日志，事件日志，如果分析是可用的，并在运行时启用的差别。

trans-unit.source: The traceEventIO function emits a message to the eventlog, if eventlog profiling is available and enabled at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 如果 traceEventIO 分析可用并在运行时启用，则traceEventIO函数会向事件日志发出消息。

trans-unit.source: The traceIO function outputs the trace message from the IO monad. This sequences the output with respect to other IO actions.
trans-unit.target: 所述 traceIO 函数输出来自IO单子跟踪消息。这将根据其他IO动作对输出进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The traceMarker function emits a marker to the eventlog, if eventlog profiling is available and enabled at runtime. The String is the name of the marker. The name is just used in the profiling tools to help you keep clear which marker is which.
trans-unit.target: 该 traceMarker 功能发出一个标记，事件日志，事件日志，如果分析是可用的，并在运行时启用。该 String 是标记的名称。该名称仅在分析工具中使用，以帮助您弄清楚哪个标记是哪个标记。

trans-unit.source: The traceMarkerIO function emits a marker to the eventlog, if eventlog profiling is available and enabled at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 如果 traceMarkerIO 分析可用并在运行时启用，则traceMarkerIO函数将向事件日志发出标记。

trans-unit.source: The ForeignPtr is parameterised in the same way as Ptr. The type argument of ForeignPtr should normally be an instance of class Storable.
trans-unit.target: 该 ForeignPtr 被以同样的方式作为参数化 Ptr 。 ForeignPtr 的类型参数通常应为 Storable 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The ForeignPtr type and operations. This module is part of the Foreign Function Interface (FFI) and will usually be imported via the Foreign module.
trans-unit.target: 该 ForeignPtr 类型和操作。该模块是外部功能接口（FFI）的一部分，通常将通过外部模块导入。

trans-unit.source: The ForeignPtr is parameterised in the same way as Ptr. The type argument of ForeignPtr should normally be an instance of class Storable.
trans-unit.target: 该 ForeignPtr 被以同样的方式作为参数化 Ptr 。 ForeignPtr 的类型参数通常应为 Storable 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The ForeignPtr type and operations. This module is part of the Foreign Function Interface (FFI) and will usually be imported via the Foreign module.
trans-unit.target: 该 ForeignPtr 类型和操作。该模块是外部功能接口（FFI）的一部分，通常将通过外部模块导入。

trans-unit.source: The castPtr function casts a pointer from one type to another.
trans-unit.target: 所述 castPtr 功能投射的指针从一种类型到另一个。

trans-unit.source: The Ix class is used to map a contiguous subrange of values in a type onto integers. It is used primarily for array indexing (see the array package).
trans-unit.target: 的 Ix 类用于在一个类型到整数映射值的连续子区间。它主要用于数组索引（请参阅数组包）。

trans-unit.source: The accumArray function deals with repeated indices in the association list using an accumulating function which combines the values of associations with the same index.
trans-unit.target: 所述 accumArray 与使用在所述关联列表中重复指数函数优惠累积功能相结合的关联的值具有相同的索引。

trans-unit.source: The Monad class defines the basic operations over a monad, a concept from a branch of mathematics known as category theory. From the perspective of a Haskell programmer, however, it is best to think of a monad as an abstract datatype of actions. Haskell's do expressions provide a convenient syntax for writing monadic expressions.
trans-unit.target: 该 Monad 类定义的基本操作在单子从被称为数学的一个分支，一个概念范畴论。但是，从Haskell程序员的角度来看，最好将monad视为动作的抽象数据类型。Haskell的 do 表达式为编写单子表达式提供了一种方便的语法。

trans-unit.source: The join function is the conventional monad join operator. It is used to remove one level of monadic structure, projecting its bound argument into the outer level.
trans-unit.target: 该 join 的功能是传统的单子连接操作。它用于删除单子结构的一个级别，将其绑定参数投射到外部级别。

trans-unit.source: The yield action allows (forces, in a co-operative multitasking implementation) a context-switch to any other currently runnable threads (if any), and is occasionally useful when implementing concurrency abstractions.
trans-unit.target: 的 yield 操作允许（力，在一个合作多任务执行）一个上下文切换到任何其它目前可运行的线程（如果有的话），并实施并发抽象时是偶尔是有用的。

trans-unit.source: The yield action allows (forces, in a co-operative multitasking implementation) a context-switch to any other currently runnable threads (if any), and is occasionally useful when implementing concurrency abstractions.
trans-unit.target: 的 yield 操作允许（力，在一个合作多任务执行）一个上下文切换到任何其它目前可运行的线程（如果有的话），并实施并发抽象时是偶尔是有用的。

trans-unit.source: The Bounded class is used to name the upper and lower limits of a type. Ord is not a superclass of Bounded since types that are not totally ordered may also have upper and lower bounds.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Bounded 类用于命名的类型的上限和下限。 Ord 不是 Bounded 的超类，因为未完全排序的类型也可能具有上限和下限。

trans-unit.source: The Bounded class may be derived for any enumeration type; minBound is the first constructor listed in the data declaration and maxBound is the last. Bounded may also be derived for single-constructor datatypes whose constituent types are in Bounded.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Bounded 类可衍生自任何枚举类型; minBound 是 data 声明中列出的第一个构造函数，而 maxBound 是最后一个。 Bounded 也可以导出单构造的数据类型，其构成类型在 Bounded 。

trans-unit.source: The Enum and Bounded classes.
trans-unit.target: 该 Enum 和 Bounded 类。

trans-unit.source: The Down type allows you to reverse sort order conveniently. A value of type Down a contains a value of type a (represented as Down a). If a has an Ord instance associated with it then comparing two values thus wrapped will give you the opposite of their normal sort order. This is particularly useful when sorting in generalised list comprehensions, as in: then sortWith by Down x
trans-unit.target: 该 Down 类型，您可以方便地反向排序。类型为 Down a 的值包含类型 a a的值（表示为 Down a ）。如果 a 具有与之关联的 Ord 实例，则比较由此包装的两个值将得到与它们正常排序顺序相反的结果。在按广义列表 then sortWith by Down x 排序时，这特别有用，例如：then down by Down x

trans-unit.source: The IsList class and its methods are intended to be used in conjunction with the OverloadedLists extension.
trans-unit.target: 的 IsList 类及其方法意在与OverloadedLists扩展一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The Item type function returns the type of items of the structure l.
trans-unit.target: Item 类型函数返回结构 l 的项目类型。

trans-unit.source: The fromList function constructs the structure l from the given list of Item l
trans-unit.target: 在 fromList 函数构造结构 l 从给定的清单 Item l

trans-unit.source: The fromListN function takes the input list's length as a hint. Its behaviour should be equivalent to fromList. The hint can be used to construct the structure l more efficiently compared to fromList. If the given hint does not equal to the input list's length the behaviour of fromListN is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 该 fromListN 函数获取输入列表长度作为提示。它的行为应等效于 fromList 。与 fromList 相比，该提示可用于更有效地构造结构 l 。如果给定的提示不等于输入列表的长度，则不指定 fromListN 的行为。

trans-unit.source: The groupWith function uses the user supplied function which projects an element out of every list element in order to first sort the input list and then to form groups by equality on these projected elements
trans-unit.target: 所述 groupWith 函数使用用户提供的功能，其上这些预计元件由平等突出的元件每列表元素的以第一排序输入列表，然后以形成基团

trans-unit.source: The lazy function restrains strictness analysis a little. The call lazy e means the same as e, but lazy has a magical property so far as strictness analysis is concerned: it is lazy in its first argument, even though its semantics is strict. After strictness analysis has run, calls to lazy are inlined to be the identity function.
trans-unit.target: 在 lazy 功能性约束的严格分析一点点。调用 lazy e 的含义与 e 相同，但是就严格性分析而言， lazy 具有神奇的性质：即使其语义严格，它的第一个参数也是惰性的。运行严格性分析后，内联到 lazy 的调用将成为身份功能。

trans-unit.source: The oneShot function can be used to give a hint to the compiler that its argument will be called at most once, which may (or may not) enable certain optimizations. It can be useful to improve the performance of code in continuation passing style.
trans-unit.target: 的 oneShot 的功能可以被用来给出提示给编译器，它的参数将至多一次被调用，其可以（或可以不）使某些优化。以连续传递方式提高代码性能可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: The sortWith function sorts a list of elements using the user supplied function to project something out of each element
trans-unit.target: 该 sortWith 函数对使用用户提供的函数，项目东西元素的列表每个元素的

trans-unit.source: The toList function extracts a list of Item l from the structure l. It should satisfy fromList . toList = id.
trans-unit.target: 该 toList 函数提取列表 Item l 从结构 l 。它应该满足fromList。toList = ID。

trans-unit.source: The ForeignPtr is parameterised in the same way as Ptr. The type argument of ForeignPtr should normally be an instance of class Storable.
trans-unit.target: 该 ForeignPtr 被以同样的方式作为参数化 Ptr 。 ForeignPtr 的类型参数通常应为 Storable 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The C1 ('MetaCons "Leaf" 'PrefixI 'False) and C1 ('MetaCons "Node" 'PrefixI 'False) invocations indicate that the enclosed part is the representation of the first and second constructor of datatype Tree, respectively. Here, the meta-information regarding constructor names, fixity and whether it has named fields or not is encoded at the type level. The 'MetaCons type is also an instance of the type class Constructor. This type class can be used to obtain information about the constructor at the value level.
trans-unit.target: 的 C1 ('MetaCons "Leaf" 'PrefixI 'False) 和 C1 ('MetaCons "Node" 'PrefixI 'False) 调用指示该封闭部分是数据类型的第一和第二构造的表示 Tree ，分别。在这里，有关构造函数名称，固定性以及是否具有命名字段的元信息在类型级别进行编码。该 'MetaCons 类型也是类型的类的实例 Constructor 。此类型类可用于在值级别获取有关构造函数的信息。

trans-unit.source: The D1 ('MetaData "Tree" "Main" "package-name" 'False) tag indicates that the enclosed part is the representation of the datatype Tree. Again, the meta-information is encoded at the type level. The 'MetaData type is an instance of class Datatype, which can be used to obtain the name of a datatype, the module it has been defined in, the package it is located under, and whether it has been defined using data or newtype at the value level.
trans-unit.target: 的 D1 ('MetaData "Tree" "Main" "package-name" 'False) 标签指示包围的部分是数据类型的表示 Tree 。同样，元信息是在类型级别上编码的。所述 'MetaData 类型是类的实例 Datatype ，这可以被用来获得一个数据类型的名字，它在被限定的模块，它位于下包，以及它是否已使用被定义 data 或 newtype 在价值水平。

trans-unit.source: The S1 ('MetaSel 'Nothing 'NoSourceUnpackedness 'NoSourceStrictness 'DecidedLazy) tag indicates several things. The 'Nothing indicates that there is no record field selector associated with this field of the constructor (if there were, it would have been marked 'Just "recordName" instead). The other types contain meta-information on the field's strictness:
trans-unit.target: 在 S1 ('MetaSel 'Nothing 'NoSourceUnpackedness 'NoSourceStrictness 'DecidedLazy) 标签指示几件事情。在 'Nothing 表明存在与构造的这个领域相关的任何记录字段选择器（如果有的话，它会被标记为 'Just "recordName" 代替）。其他类型包含有关字段严格性的元信息：

trans-unit.source: The Integer type.
trans-unit.target: 该 Integer 类型。

trans-unit.source: The CodingFailureMode is used to construct TextEncodings, and specifies how they handle illegal sequences.
trans-unit.target: 该 CodingFailureMode 用于构建 TextEncoding S，并且指定他们如何处理非法的序列。

trans-unit.source: The product function computes the product of a finite list of numbers.
trans-unit.target: 该 product 函数计算数字的有限清单的产品。

trans-unit.source: The sum function computes the sum of a finite list of numbers.
trans-unit.target: 的 sum 函数计算数字的有限列表的总和。

trans-unit.source: The unzip3 function takes a list of triples and returns three lists, analogous to unzip.
trans-unit.target: 该 unzip3 函数接受三元并返回三个列表，类似的列表 unzip 。

trans-unit.source: The zipWith3 function takes a function which combines three elements, as well as three lists and returns a list of their point-wise combination, analogous to zipWith. It is capable of list fusion, but it is restricted to its first list argument and its resulting list.
trans-unit.target: 该 zipWith3 功能需要，是由三个要素，以及三个列表并返回其逐点组合的清单，类似于一个功能 zipWith 。它能够进行列表融合，但仅限于其第一个列表参数及其结果列表。

trans-unit.source: The Maybe type encapsulates an optional value. A value of type Maybe a either contains a value of type a (represented as Just a), or it is empty (represented as Nothing). Using Maybe is a good way to deal with errors or exceptional cases without resorting to drastic measures such as error.
trans-unit.target: 该 Maybe 类型封装了一个可选值。类型的值 Maybe a 或者包含类型的值 a （表示为 Just a ），或者它是空的（表示为 Nothing ）。使用 Maybe 是处理错误或特殊情况的好方法，而无需采取 error 严厉措施。

trans-unit.source: The Maybe type is also a monad. It is a simple kind of error monad, where all errors are represented by Nothing. A richer error monad can be built using the Either type.
trans-unit.target: 该 Maybe 类型也是一个单子。这是一种简单的错误单子，所有错误都由 Nothing 表示。可以使用 Either 类型构建更丰富的错误单子。

trans-unit.source: The Num class and the Integer type.
trans-unit.target: 在 Num 类和 Integer 类型。

trans-unit.source: The \\ function is list difference (non-associative). In the result of xs\\ys, the first occurrence of each element of ys in turn (if any) has been removed from xs. Thus
trans-unit.target: 该 \\ 功能列表差异（非关联）。根据 xs \\ ys 的结果，依次将 ys 的每个元素的第一次出现（如果有的话）从 xs 中删除。从而

trans-unit.source: The deleteFirstsBy function takes a predicate and two lists and returns the first list with the first occurrence of each element of the second list removed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 deleteFirstsBy 函数采用一个谓语和两个列表并移除所述第二列表中的每个元素的第一次出现返回第一个列表。

trans-unit.target: 该 dropWhileEnd 机能下降，其中给定的断言为所有元素的列表中最大的后缀。例如：

trans-unit.source: The elemIndex function returns the index of the first element in the given list which is equal (by ==) to the query element, or Nothing if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 elemIndex 函数返回在给定列表的第一个元素的索引，其等于（由 == ）到查询元件，或 Nothing 如果不存在这样的元件。

trans-unit.source: The elemIndices function extends elemIndex, by returning the indices of all elements equal to the query element, in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 所述 elemIndices 功能延伸 elemIndex ，通过返回所有元素的索引等于查询元件，按升序排列。

trans-unit.source: The find function takes a predicate and a list and returns the first element in the list matching the predicate, or Nothing if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 该 find 功能需要一个谓语和一个列表，返回列表中的第一个元素相匹配的谓语，或 Nothing ，如果没有这样的元素。

trans-unit.source: The findIndex function takes a predicate and a list and returns the index of the first element in the list satisfying the predicate, or Nothing if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 findIndex 函数采用一个谓语和列表，并返回第一个元素的索引列表中的满足谓词，或 Nothing 如果不存在这样的元件。

trans-unit.source: The findIndices function extends findIndex, by returning the indices of all elements satisfying the predicate, in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 该 findIndices 功能扩展 findIndex ，通过返回满足谓词的所有元素的索引，按升序排列。

trans-unit.source: The genericDrop function is an overloaded version of drop, which accepts any Integral value as the number of elements to drop.
trans-unit.target: 该 genericDrop 函数是一个重载版本的 drop ，它接受任何 Integral 值作为要素下降的数量。

trans-unit.source: The genericIndex function is an overloaded version of !!, which accepts any Integral value as the index.
trans-unit.target: 该 genericIndex 功能的重载版本 !! ，它接受任何 Integral 数值作为索引。

trans-unit.source: The genericReplicate function is an overloaded version of replicate, which accepts any Integral value as the number of repetitions to make.
trans-unit.target: 该 genericReplicate 函数是一个重载版本的 replicate ，它接受任何 Integral 值作为重复数作出。

trans-unit.source: The genericSplitAt function is an overloaded version of splitAt, which accepts any Integral value as the position at which to split.
trans-unit.target: 该 genericSplitAt 函数是的重载版本 splitAt ，它接受任何 Integral 值作为在该分割的位置。

trans-unit.source: The genericTake function is an overloaded version of take, which accepts any Integral value as the number of elements to take.
trans-unit.target: 该 genericTake 函数是一个重载版本的 take ，它接受任何 Integral 值作为元素采取的数量。

trans-unit.source: The groupBy function is the non-overloaded version of group.
trans-unit.target: 的 groupBy 功能是与非过负荷版本的 group 。

trans-unit.source: The intersectBy function is the non-overloaded version of intersect.
trans-unit.target: 该 intersectBy 功能是与非过负荷版本的 intersect 。
